title: [Large-scale] Strategy Development for Reducing Dropout Rates in Online Science Teacher Education Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary science education content and fundamental online learning skills
context.additional_context: A project-based assessment-centered course conducted in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) setting.

learning_goals: Successfully completing online courses with an 80% or higher completion rate
Learners apply Course Wall identification and overcoming strategies at 75% or higher during mid-course checkpoints
Learners improve learning motivation sustainability by 20% through peer feedback and instructor support
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
